weekly picks (May 3 week 2023)

Posted on May 15, 2023 in 2023may,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 May 3rd week collection

  1. adma.202211634 Topological Spin Textures in a Non-Collinear Antiferromagnet System (Mn3Sn skyrmion, Advanced Materials)

  2. 2305.09586 Superconductivity near 80 Kelvin in single crystals of La3Ni2O7 under pressure (arXiv)

  3. 2305.09531 Photoinduced dynamics of flat bands in the kagome metal CoSn (flat, arXiv)

  4. 2305.09409 Sublattice Pairing in Pyrochlore Heisenberg Antiferromagnets (arXiv)

  5. 2305.09347 A simplified method characterizing magnetic ordering modulated photo-thermoelectric response in noncentrosymmetric semimetal Ca3Ru2O7 (arXiv)

  6. 2305.09077 Magnon Hall effect in antiferromagnetic lattices (magnon, arXiv)

  7. 2305.09012 A Quantitative Solution to the Kondo Lattice Problem (arXiv)

  8. 2305.08897 Analog gravity and the continuum effective theory of the graphene tight binding lattice model (arXiv)

  9. 2305.09197 Mixed-State Quantum Spin Liquid in Kitaev Lindbladian: Dynamical Anyon Condensation (arXiv)

  10. 2305.09616 Non-trivial Flat Bands in Three Dimensions (3DFlat, arXiv)

  11. 2305.09577 Towards tunable graphene phononic crystals (arXiv)

  12. 2305.09532 Plasmons in phosphorene nanoribbons (BP, arXiv)

  13. 2305.09202 Breakdown of helical edge state topologically protected conductance in time-reversal-breaking excitonic insulators (JEMoore, arXiv)

  14. PhysRevLett.130.207001 Trivial Andreev Band Mimicking Topological Bulk Gap Reopening in the Nonlocal Conductance of Long Rashba Nanowires (Jelena, PRL)

  15. PhysRevB.107.L180402 Double-$Q$ ground state with topological charge stripes in the centrosymmetric skyrmion candidate ${\mathrm{GdRu}}{2}{\mathrm{Si}}{2}$ (PRB)

  16. s41567-023-02060-0 Dirac revivals drive a resonance response in twisted bilayer graphene (Nature Physics)

  17. 2305.08406v1 Superconducting-insulating quantum phase transition associated with valence change in compressed perovskite bismuth-oxides (arXiv)

  18. 2305.08058 Superconducting phase above room temperature in lutetium-beryllium hydrides at high pressures (Lu, arXiv)

  19. 2305.08038 First Principles and Machine Learning Identify Key Pairing Strength Factors of Cuprate Superconductors (arXiv)

  20. 2305.08646 Magnetic order and electronic transport properties in the Mn$_3$Al compound: the role of the structural state (arXiv)

  21. 2305.08357 Field-driven spatiotemporal manipulation of Majorana zero modes in Kitaev spin liquid (arXiv)

  22. 2305.08333 Magnetic bubble crystal in tetragonal magnets (Hayami, arXiv)

  23. 2305.08171 Topological heavy fermions in magnetic field (arXiv)

  24. 2305.08141 Electronic instability in pressured black phosphorus under strong magnetic field (BP, arXiv)

  25. 2305.08109 Higher Berry curvature from matrix product states (arXiv)

  26. 2305.08584 Topological Phase Transitions of Generalized Brillouin Zone (arXiv)

  27. 2305.08149 Non-divergent Chiral Charge Pumping in Weyl Semimetal (HWLee, arXiv)

  28. 2305.08728 Order parameter dynamics in Mn$_3$Sn driven by DC and pulsed spin-orbit torques (Mn3Sn, arXiv.org)

  29. 2305.07619 Light-induced insulator-metal transition in Sr$_2$IrO$_4$ reveals the nature of the insulating ground state (iridates, arXiv)

  30. 2305.07589 Spacetime magnetic hopfions: from internal excitations and braiding of skyrmions (skyrmion, arXiv)

  31. 2305.07327 Observation and formation mechanism of 360{\deg} domain wall rings in Synthetic Anti-Ferromagnets with interlayer chiral interactions (DW, arXiv)

  32. 2305.07191 Observation of 1D Fermi arc states in Weyl semimetal TaAs (arXiv)

  33. 2305.07174 Chess-board Acoustic Crystals with Momentum-space Nonsymmorphic Symmetries (arXiv)

  34. 2305.07112 Detecting Fractionalization in Critical Spin Liquids using Color Centers (arXiv)

  35. 2305.07063 Gaining insights on anyon condensation and 1-form symmetry breaking across a topological phase transition in a deformed toric code model (arXiv)
